messages.content: What is the Comfyui HiFORCE Plugin?
The Comfyui HiFORCE Plugin is a custom nodes pack provided by HiFORCE for ComfyUI that helps to conveniently enhance images through Sampler, Upscaler, Mask, and more.
What prerequisites are required for the Comfyui HiFORCE Plugin?
You should install [ComfyUI-Impact-Pack](https://github.com/ltdrdata/ComfyUI-Impact-Pack). Many optimizations are built upon the foundation of ComfyUI-Impact-Pack.
How do I install the Comfyui HiFORCE Plugin?

To install, you need to go to the 'custom_nodes' directory, clone the repository using 'git clone https://github.com/hiforce/comfyui-hiforce-plugin.git', and then navigate to the 'comfyui-hiforce-plugin' directory and run 'pip install -r requirements.txt'.
What are the types of Samplers available in the Comfyui HiFORCE Plugin?
The types of Samplers available are Basic Sampler, Loopback Sampler, HfTwoSamplersForMask, HfTwoStepSamplers, HfIterativeLatentUpscale, and Some Swith Input for Sampler Node.
What is the 'full_drawing' option in the Basic Sampler node?

The 'full_drawing' option in the Basic Sampler corresponds to the 'return_with_leftover_noise' option in KSampler (Advanced), but with opposite values. It is named 'full_drawing' for user-friendliness, especially for developers familiar with the Stable Diffusion WebUI.
What does the Loopback Sampler allow?
The Loopback Sampler allows you to generate images progressively using different drawing intensities.
What is the 'enable' option in the HfTwoSamplersForMask node?
The 'enable' option in the HfTwoSamplersForMask node is an enhancement. If the 'enable' option is set to false, then this sampler will not function.
What does the HfTwoStepSamplers node allow you to do?
The HfTwoStepSamplers node allows you to use different sampler algorithms and masks in two-step sampling.
What is the 'enable' option in the HfIterativeLatentUpscale node?
The 'enable' option in the HfIterativeLatentUpscale node is an enhancement. If the 'enable' option is set to false, then this node will not function.
